question: Who allied with the Reddy Kingdom to defeat Firoj Shah Bahamani?
explanation: The Tuluva dynasty ruler, Devaraya-I was defeated by Firoz Shah Bahmani and had to marry his daughter to him. Later, he entered into an alliance with the Reddy Kingdom and managed to defeat Firoz Shah Bahmani and annexed the territory up to the mouth of river Krishna. He also built a dam across river Tungabhadra.
